pkgmetadata.longdescription: Assortative Mating Simulation and Multivariate Bernoulli Variates // Simulation of phenotype / genotype data under assortative mating. Includes functions for generating Bahadur order-2 multivariate Bernoulli variables with general and diagonal- plus-low-rank correlation structures. Further details are provided in: Border and Malik (2022) doi:10.1101/2022.10.13.512132.
